titles.title: Jesus, the very thought of Thee

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus, the very thought of Thee With sweetness fills my breast; But sweeter far Thy face to see, And in Thy presence rest.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Nor voice can sing, nor heart can frame, Nor can the memory find A sweeter sound than Thy blest Name, O Savior of mankind!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O Hope of every contrite heart, O Joy of all the meek, To those who fall, how kind Thou art! How good to those who seek!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: But what to those who find? Ah, this Nor tongue nor pen can show; The love of Jesus, what it is None but His loved ones know.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: O Jesus! light of all below! Thou fount of life and fire! Surpassing all the joys we know, And all we can desire.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: No other source have we but Thee, Soul-thirst to satisfy. Exhaustless spring! the waters free! All other streams are dry.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: Jesus, our only Joy be Thou, As Thou our Prize wilt be; Jesus, be Thou our Glory now, And through eternity.
